overview: From 2025-03-02 to 2025-03-09, elizaos/eliza had 125 new PRs (83 merged), 13 new issues, and 64 active contributors.

completedItems.title: fix: Fixed issue with async handling in getTweets method
completedItems.body:
# What does this PR do?  
This change fixes an issue where the `getTweets` method was not awaited, causing potential issues with handling the returned promise. The method is asynchronous, so I added `await` to properly wait for the promise
